field.name: coreapp
field.label: Core Application
field.description: Causes this application to not appear in the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

field.name: position
field.label: Position
field.description: Default position if you select this as core apps

field.name: category
field.label: Category
field.description: Show only quizzes form categories listed in this textfield (seperated by comma eg. 1,2,3). Leave it blank to display all quizzes.

field.name: limit
field.label: Limit
field.description: Limit the length of the quiz short description (default is 50).

field.name: count
field.label: Count
field.description: The number of quizzes to display per page(default is 10)

field.name: introtext
field.label: Short description
field.description: Select whether to display the short description of the quiz.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin
